title: Microlearning for Agricultural Knowledge Exchange Network Construction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of agricultural production processes and local agricultural association activities
context.additional_context: Mobile-based practical education utilizing adult learners' experiences, including networking activities linked with local agricultural associations

learning_goals: Learners can identify and utilize formal/informal channels of agricultural knowledge exchange networks.
Learners can improve problem-solving skills by sharing experiences with peer farmers.
Learners can design operational plans for knowledge exchange communities on mobile platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
